verses.verse: And it came to pass in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, when there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>sojourning<s%> on the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, who <S%H3947>took<s%> to him a <S%H802>concubine<s%> <S%H6370><s%> out of <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> <S%H3063><s%>. a concubine: Heb. a woman a concubine, or, a wife a concubine

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> against him, and went <S%H3212>away<s%> from him unto her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> <S%H3063><s%>, and was there <S%H702>four<s%> whole <S%H2320>months<s%> <S%H3117><s%>. four whole months: or, a year and four month: Heb. days, four months

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3820>friendly<s%> unto her, and to bring her <S%H7725>again<s%>, having his <S%H5288>servant<s%> with him, and a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>asses<s%>: and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: and when the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, he <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him. friendly: Heb. to her heart

And his father in <S%H2859>law<s%>, the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H2388>retained<s%> him; and he <S%H3427>abode<s%> with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: so they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, when they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>: and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his son in <S%H2860>law<s%>, <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> with a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> go your <S%H3212>way<s%>. Comfort: Heb. Strengthen

And they sat <S%H3427>down<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together<s%>: for the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>, Be <S%H2974>content<s%>, I pray thee, and tarry all <S%H3885>night<s%>, and let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry<s%>.
And when the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>, his father in <S%H2859>law<s%> <S%H6484>urged<s%> him: therefore he <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And he arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>: and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I pray thee. And they <S%H4102>tarried<s%> until <S%H3117>afternoon<s%> <S%H5186><s%>, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them. until afternoon: Heb. till the day declined

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>, he, and his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, and his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, his father in <S%H2859>law<s%>, the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold, now the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7503>draweth<s%> toward <S%H6150>evening<s%>, I pray you tarry all <S%H3885>night<s%>: behold, the <S%H3117>day<s%> groweth to an <S%H2583>end<s%>, <S%H3885>lodge<s%> here, that thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> may be <S%H3190>merry<s%>; and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> get you <S%H7925>early<s%> on your <S%H1870>way<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H168>home<s%>. draweth: Heb. is weak the day groweth to an end: Heb. it is the pitching time of the day home: Heb. to thy tent

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not tarry that <S%H3885>night<s%>, but he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>, which is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and there were with him <S%H6776>two<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H2280>saddled<s%>, his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> also was with him. over against: Heb. to over against

And when they were by <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H7286>spent<s%>; and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, I pray thee, and let us turn <S%H5493>in<s%> into this <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in it.

And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We will not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> hither into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of a <S%H5237>stranger<s%>, that is not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; we will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places<s%> to lodge all <S%H3885>night<s%>, in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, or in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And they passed <S%H5674>on<s%> and went their <S%H3212>way<s%>; and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down<s%> upon them when they were <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, which belongeth to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And they turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> thither, to go <S%H935>in<s%> and to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: and when he went <S%H935>in<s%>, he sat him <S%H3427>down<s%> in a <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: for there was no <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>took<s%> them into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>lodging<s%>.

And, behold, there <S%H935>came<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>work<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, which was <S%H376>also<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; and he <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: but the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites<s%>.

And when he had lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Whither <S%H3212>goest<s%> thou? and <S%H370>whence<s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We are <S%H5674>passing<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> <S%H3063><s%> toward the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; from thence am I: and I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> <S%H3063><s%>, but I am now <S%H1980>going<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and there is no <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>receiveth<s%> me to <S%H1004>house<s%>. receiveth: Heb. gathereth

Yet there <S%H3426>is<s%> both <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for our <S%H2543>asses<s%>; and there is <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> also for me, and for thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, and for the young <S%H5288>man<s%> which is with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>: there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> of any <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

And the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be with thee; <S%H7535>howsoever<s%> let all thy <S%H4270>wants<s%> lie upon me; only <S%H3885>lodge<s%> not in the <S%H7339>street<s%>.

So he <S%H935>brought<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and gave <S%H1101>provender<s%> unto the <S%H2543>asses<s%>: and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

Now as they were making their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3190>merry<s%>, behold, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%>, <S%H5437>beset<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5437>about<s%>, and <S%H1849>beat<s%> at the <S%H1817>door<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> him.

And the <S%H376>man<s%>, the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto them, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H408>Nay<s%>, my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, nay, I pray you, do not so <S%H7489>wickedly<s%>; <S%H310>seeing<s%> that this <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> into mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> not this <S%H5039>folly<s%>.

Behold, here is my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1330>maiden<s%>, and his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>; them I will bring <S%H3318>out<s%> now, and <S%H6031>humble<s%> ye them, and <S%H6213>do<s%> with them what <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto you: but unto this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H2063>so<s%> <S%H5039>vile<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%>. so vile: Heb. the matter of this folly

But the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to him: so the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>took<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> her <S%H2351>forth<s%> unto them; and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> her, and <S%H5953>abused<s%> her all the <S%H3915>night<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and when the <S%H7837>day<s%> began to <S%H5927>spring<s%>, they let her <S%H7971>go<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H6437>dawning<s%> of the <S%H1242>day<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> where her <S%H113>lord<s%> was, till it was <S%H216>light<s%>.

And her <S%H113>lord<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>: and, behold, the <S%H802>woman<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and her <S%H3027>hands<s%> were upon the <S%H5592>threshold<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, and let us be <S%H3212>going<s%>. But none <S%H6030>answered<s%>. Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her up upon an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>gat<s%> him unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3979>knife<s%>, and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, and <S%H5408>divided<s%> her, together with her <S%H6106>bones<s%>, into <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her into all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it was <S%H1961>so<s%>, that all that <S%H7200>saw<s%> it <S%H559>said<s%>, There was no such <S%H2063>deed<s%> done nor <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H7760>consider<s%> of it, take <S%H5779>advice<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> your minds.
